documentation: A human being which is part of a team.

fields.documentation: First name of this person. For instance, John.
fields.name: first_name

fields.documentation: Last name (a.k.a. Given name) of this person. For instance, Smith.
fields.name: last_name

fields.documentation: If {@code true}, this person has blue eyes. Otherwise, this person doesn't have blue eyes.
fields.name: has_blue_eyes

enumValues.OTHER: Value to use when neither male nor female
